java.util.concurrent

Interface ScheduledFuture<V>

  • 参数类型
    V结果返回的类型的未来
    All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable < Delayed >， Delayed， Future
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RunnableScheduledFuture 

    public interface ScheduledFuture<V>
extends Delayed, Future<V>
    一种可以取消的延迟结果承载动作。通常一个预定的未来是一个 ScheduledExecutorService任务调度的结果。
    从以下版本开始：
    一点五

    • 方法摘要

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Delayed

        getDelay

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Future

        cancel, get, get, isCancelled, isDone
